section.p: Used to configure the watermark image to be added.
Used to configure the settings for the watermark image to be added.
Used to configure the watermark image to be added.
Used to configure the watermark image to be added.

plentry.pd:
Whether the watermark is visible in the local preview view:
: (default) The watermark is visible in the local preview view.
: The watermark is not visible in the local preview view.
When the watermark fit mode is FitModeCoverPosition, this sets the watermark image area in landscape mode. See .
When the watermark fit mode is FitModeCoverPosition, this sets the watermark image area in portrait mode. See .
When the watermark fit mode is FitModeUseImageRatio, this parameter sets the watermark coordinates in scaling mode. See .
Watermark fit mode. See .
Z-order of the watermark image. The default value is 0.

Whether the watermark is visible in the local preview view:
: (default) The watermark is visible in the local preview view.
: The watermark is not visible in the local preview view.
When the watermark fit mode is FitModeCoverPosition, sets the area of the watermark image in landscape mode. See .
When the watermark fit mode is FitModeCoverPosition, sets the area of the watermark image in portrait mode. See .
When the watermark fit mode is FitModeUseImageRatio, this parameter sets the watermark coordinates in scaling mode. See .
The fit mode of the watermark. See .
The z-order of the watermark image. Default is 0.

Whether the watermark is visible in the local preview view:
: (Default) The watermark is visible in the local preview view.
: The watermark is not visible in the local preview view.
When the watermark fit mode is fitModeCoverPosition, this parameter sets the area of the watermark image in landscape mode. See .
When the watermark fit mode is fitModeCoverPosition, this parameter sets the area of the watermark image in portrait mode. See .
When the watermark fit mode is fitModeUseImageRatio, this parameter sets the watermark coordinates in scaling mode. See .
The fit mode of the watermark. See .
Z-order of the watermark image. Default value is 0.

Whether the watermark is visible in the local preview view:
: (Default) The watermark is visible in the local preview view.
: The watermark is not visible in the local preview view.
When the watermark fit mode is FIT_MODE_COVER_POSITION, this sets the area of the watermark image in landscape mode. See .
When the watermark fit mode is FIT_MODE_COVER_POSITION, this sets the area of the watermark image in portrait mode. See .
When the watermark fit mode is FIT_MODE_USE_IMAGE_RATIO, this parameter sets the coordinates of the watermark in scale mode. See .
Watermark fit mode. See .
Layer order of the watermark image. Default value is 0.
